content.text: There has been continued coverage around the Renters (Reform) Bill.
This landmark legislation will provide a fairer private rented sector and deliver on the manifesto commitment to ban Section 21 evictions.
The Bill is progressing through the House of Commons and will return shortly.
“We are committed to delivering our landmark Renters (Reform) Bill that will provide a fairer private rented sector for both tenants and landlords.
“The Bill will abolish section 21 evictions – giving people more security in their homes and empowering them to challenge poor practices.”
